```{r}
point_sample <- lapply(seq(1234, seed, 1000), function(x){
  readRDS(paste0("point_sample_", x, ".rds"))
})
point_sample <- do.call(c, point_sample)

load("us_map_and_border_lengths.RData")

  geom_sf(data = us) +

ggplotly(p)
```
